name: The Most Dangerous Crosswalk
description:
Driven to madness by the death of your family in a tragic crosswalking accident you build a machine to change the past. To stop them from ever stepping foot into danger you have to close that crosswalk down forever. How can you do this? Make it The Most Dangerous Crosswalk. How to play:

- Manually spawn cars by clicking on the road

- Buy upgrades to cause more havoc

Note: There is no sound or music as I neglected adding those to the game because I wanted to play Minecraft 

:' - (

I'm sorry, but it was also some good Minecrafting.
